title: Cartoons!
author: verias
text:
Hidden Names: Bard

So, with some of what you'll see in this page, you'll note that cartoons were a bit of the inspiration. Do you guys have any cartoons you enjoy? And I mean anything, from anime, to Scooby Doo, to He-Man.

replies.author: Kietra*Guest*
replies.text: I'm dating myself with this one, but I was always partial to The Littles.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Dammit Mandrake, watch where you're flying!


Some anime/cartoon shows that i like:
Axe cop, Batman, Black lagoon, Cowboy bebop, Darker than black, Hellsing, Justice league, One piece, Trigun, Venture bros.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TOKYD7ua0sY

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text:
Mandrake, Got in too much of a hurry dear?

Hmm some cartooon/anime shows I like...Heaven's Lost Property, Justice League, Avengers EMH, Outlaw Staw.

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text:
Darkwing Duck

So what was that, a bug zapper? Poor lil' Mandrake.
